title: TikTok Stars Go On a D.C. Field Trip
description: On the bus, off the bus and all over Capitol Hill with creators turned temporary lobbyists. Wait, does anybody need a bathroom break?

title: Utah Law Could Curb Use of TikTok and Instagram by Children and Teens
description: The law, which prohibits social networks from allowing minors to have accounts without parental consent, may come as welcome news to many families even as it raises privacy concerns.

title: Lawmakers Blast TikTok’s C.E.O. for App’s Ties to China, Escalating Tensions
description: Lawmakers grilled Shou Chew, TikTok’s chief executive, over the app’s ties to its Chinese parent company and its effects on children, as Chinese officials said they opposed a sale of the platform.

title: National security is the prevailing theme of lawmakers’ questions.
Amazon Union Prevails in Ruling on Warehouse Access for Organizing
description: Federal labor regulators said Amazon had illegally barred off-duty employees from work sites and that the policy was aimed at union backers.

title: Short Seller Accuses Jack Dorsey’s Block of Facilitating Fraud
description: Shares of the financial tech company plunged after Hindenburg Research said it had failed to stamp out illegal activity on its platforms, including drug sales and sex trafficking.

title: With Beijing Opposing a TikTok Sale, the Biden Administration’s Options Narrow
description: If the White House can’t force a sale, that would effectively leave it with two options to resolve concerns about the company.

title: Who Is the TikTok CEO Shou Chew?
description: Shou Zi Chew is testifying for

title: China Says It Will ‘Firmly Oppose’ Forced Sale of TikTok
description: China’s commerce ministry publicly rebuked the Biden administration’s efforts to push TikTok’s Chinese ownership to sell the app or face a possible ban in the United States.

title: What to Know About Today’s Congressional Hearing on TikTok
description: The Chinese-owned video app has become a battleground as the U.S. and China duel for tech leadership.

title: Chatbot Start-Up Character.AI Valued at $1 Billion in New Funding Round
description: Founded by ex-Google employees, the Silicon Valley company is among the few start-ups poised to compete with OpenAI, the creator of ChatGPT.

title: How to Set Up and Use an eSIM for International Travel
description: The digital version of the SIM card, included on many newer phones, is set to become prevalent. It also offers affordable cellular data abroad.

title: TikTok Claims It’s Limiting Teen Screen Time. Teens Say It Isn’t.
description: This month, the company announced a new 60-minute “daily screen time limit” for users under 18. But for most young users, staying on the app takes just a few taps.

title: Relativity Space’s 3-D Printed Rocket Fails Just After Launch
description: Relativity Space, a private company with ambitions for sending people to Mars, made it off the launchpad, but the vehicle experienced problems during the second stage of its flight.
